content: yuletide tree crochet yuletide tree crochet this pattern is incredibly easy quick and versatile bring some cheer to your holiday decorating as an ornament gift tag or other décor work the pattern single stranded for the festive earrings you need for this year s holiday party or you could even make a garland with lots of mini trees and string a wire of micro lights on & between them yarn & hook you can use any yarn and appropriate hook size that you like there s no critical gauge or finished size to match so it s all up to you the example i ve pictured here is made with 2 strands of sock/fingering weight yarn held together and an f/5 3 75mm hook but your results may vary yardage will depend on what you use but it s a small item and won t require much it s a great stash buster after crocheting the tree and star the decorations/details are embroidered and the two pieces are sewn together you may decorate yours the same way do something completely different or add no
